select b.aboardNo as boardNo ,b.aboardval as meetCate ,a.clubId as clubId , case when aboardval = 2 then '[모임결제]' when aboardval = 3 then '[모임일정]' end as frontTitle ,b.title as title ,a.startDate as startDate ,a.endDate as endDate from meet_name a join aboard b on a.meetNo = b.meetNo where a.clubID = #{clubId} and meetyear in #{years} and meetmon = #{month}
and b.aboardVal = 2
and b.aboardVal in (2,3)
and b.aboardVal = 3
